name: Lacazette Game
description:
This is 'Lacazette Game', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It stars a playable version of the frat boy protagonist of the original F.U.L.E. game, Jason.
The game features only two parts. The first is an introduction of the new Jason and the second is the story of his relationship with his girlfriend, Aria. Players will be able to play the game with a single controller or a Wii Remote (if applicable). The game is available for download now. It's been a long wait for Jason to finally get his own new video game. And it's about that time every year when he finally gets his own video game. But, if you can bear with it, this time you can too. The first game in the series, F.U.L.E. was released in 2003 for Nintendo GameCube. After that came F.U.L.E. 2 and F.U.L.E. 3 and F.U.L.E. 4 and F.U.L.E. 5, F.U.L.E. 6, and F.U.L.E. 7, and just recently, F.U.L.E. 8. Among that time frame, F.U.L.E. 8 is even younger than everything else. At the start of the game, Jason is a blank slate; a fresh face that has never seemed to fulfill his potential
